entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:59 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Snow beginning in the evening. Local blowing snow before morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
